metadata.title: CVE-2022-27777 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A XSS Vulnerability in Action View tag helpers >= 5.2.0 and < 5.2.0 whichwould allow an attacker to inject content if able to control input intospecific attributes.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
